/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hrm.mhshrm006.service.mapper.Mhshrm006Mapper.selectMhshrm006List */ SELECT FAMILY_CODE, FAMILY_RELATE_NM, FAMILY_ALLWNC_AMT, FNC_DATESTR(USE_BEGIN_DE) AS USE_BEGIN_DE, FNC_DATESTR(USE_END_DE) AS USE_END_DE, USE_AT, SORT_ORDR, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM
FROM MHS_FAMILYCODE A
AND (FAMILY_CODE = #{familyRelateNm} OR FAMILY_RELATE_NM LIKE '%' || #{familyRelateNm} || '%')
AND USE_AT = #{useAt}
AND REG_DT >= TO_DATE(#{sRegDt} || '000000','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
AND REG_DT <= TO_DATE(#{eRegDt} || '235959','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
ORDER BY SORT_ORDR
/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hrm.mhshrm006.service.mapper.Mhshrm006Mapper.selectMhshrb006CodeCombo */ SELECT FAMILY_CODE, FAMILY_RELATE_NM FROM MHS_FAMILYCODE A WHERE USE_AT = '1'

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hrm.mhshrm006.service.mapper.Mhshrm006Mapper.useCheckMhshrm006 */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT EMPNO AS USE_CHECK FROM MHS_FAMILY WHERE ROWNUM = '1' AND FAMILY_CODE = #{familyCode}) WHERE ROWNUM = '1'
